channel.title: Need some info about 508 servers
channel.description: i was thinking of moving up to a 508 server. i have been doing 317 server alot and time for somthing new also i want all the emotes and stuff. 317s get boring after a while. so with the 508 is it the same way to get it online like a 317? can you make a web client with these 508 servers? and 1 last question are they hard to code and stuff like that?

item.title: Need some info about 508 servers
item.dc:creator: @Pure_Demons Pure Demons
item.description:
@Pure_Demons wrote:

They’re harder than 317’s, yes.

Read full topic
